channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Amazon Web Services is minting profits
item.description: It's now a $110 billion cloud business.

item.title: Early in-person voting ending Friday in Arizona, Georgia, Nevada and 5 other states
item.description: Eight states end their early in-person voting programs on Friday, including three major swing states — Arizona, Georgia and Nevada.

item.title: Georgia Receives 15 Percent Fewer Ballot Requests From Overseas Voters Than In 2020
item.description: The number of overseas ballots requested in the state reflects a nearly 15 percent decline from what Georgia sent to overseas voters in 2020.
